name: Somethings Fishy Generations
description:
[Controls]

Q&E - High Vertical, low Horizontal jump

A&E - Standard 45 degree jump

Z&C - Low vert, high horizontal jump

SPACE: Reset to beginning, for added hilarity, this will not happen automatically (at least not yet)

ESCAPE: While in game, hit escape to go back to the title screen. Be wary however, this WILL randomize your world!

F7: When on the title screen, press F7 to wipe your medal progress

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Oh dear god, the fish is back, with an even more brutal, more skill based, randomly generated challenge. 

Beat levels at differing difficulties to unlock FISH MEDALS! 

Pour in endless hours as the level changes any time you play! Master the game, master your emotions, and most off all, become the greatest fish of all time! (Keep an eye out for HiDdeN lORe)
